plants.name: Prunus serrulata
plants.description: A deciduous tree famous for its spectacular display of pink to white blossoms in spring. It is native to Japan, Korea, and China but widely cultivated worldwide as an ornamental plant.
plants.location: Temperate regions of East Asia and cultivated globally
plants.funFact: The blooming of cherry blossoms is celebrated in Japan with festivals called Hanami, symbolizing the ephemeral nature of life.

plants.name: Narcissus pseudonarcissus
plants.description: A hardy perennial bulb native to western Europe known for its bright yellow trumpet-shaped flowers that herald the arrival of spring.
plants.location: Europe, particularly the UK and Ireland
plants.funFact: Wild daffodils are an important early nectar source for pollinators emerging in spring.
